content.query:
sales
| take 1000

sales
| where Item == 'Road-250 Black, 48'

sales
| where Item == 'Road-250 Black, 48'
| where datetime_part('year', OrderDate) > 2020

sales
| where OrderDate between (datetime(2020-01-01 00:00:00) .. datetime(2020-12-31 23:59:59))
| summarize TotalNetRevenue = sum(UnitPrice) by Item
| sort by Item asc
